subject: Re: Simsonn Order Confirmation #SSN2303
description_text:
I'll take the Black pedals, thank you for letting me know and helping me
out.

On Mon, Aug 11, 2025, 3:07â€¯AM SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:

> SIMSONN <https://www.simsonn.com>
>
> Hello, the Plus X P3-H3 / Silver / Baseplate you purchased is currently
> out of stock in our US warehouse. Due to recent delays in customs clearance
> in the US, shipments are experiencing delays, and we expect the warehouse
> to receive the goods next week. We can replace it with the Plus X P3-H3 /
> Black / Baseplate and ship it immediately from the US warehouse, or you can
> wait for the silver version to arrive. We can also ship the silver version
> you purchased from China, but customs clearance may also be very slow.
> Please let me know your preference.
>
> If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at
> service@simsonn.com
>

conversations.body_text: Hi Humberto Martinez,    Okay, we have arranged for shipment. Thank you for your understanding!
